name: Introduction to Economics
description: An introduction to the principles of economics, including microeconomics and macroeconomics.

name: Intermediate Microeconomics
description: Intermediate microeconomic theory and its application to real world economic problems.

name: Intermediate Macroeconomics
description: Intermediate macroeconomic theory and its application to real world economic problems.

name: Labor Economics
description: Labor economics examines the supply and demand of labor, compensation of workers, labor mobility, and other labor related issues.
